You follow Ner'zul south...

[Southern Avenue.]

Southern Avenue leads between the center of Spur and the homes of the prosperous and wealthy. Several of the Ladies of the city stroll along the avenue chatting about the current events and latest gossip of the Spur. Behind them, harried servants carry their reticules and all those belongings that they cannot be without.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

You follow Ner'zul south...

[Southern Avenue.]

Vast estates tower over the huge Spurian wall towards the south. The well-to-do who live in these homes idle away their days, enjoying the luxury of time. Standing next to a very empty lantern pole, a small Flerian child insists in a plaintive wail, that he had nothing to do with the missing lantern. The well-dressed guard that interrogates him keeps pointing at a small sack on the ground and its obvious contents.  An open small burlap sack, a street lantern, and a lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

You follow Ner'zul south...

[Southern Avenue & Gorey Street.]

The boughs of a large apple tree hang over the well tended avenue. Below the beautiful tree stands a small fountain. Atop the fountain is an intricately carved Secian who appears to be dancing with the water as it splashes around her. Set in the marble base is a small plaque that reads, "For those who have gone before us." Many stand for a moment as they pass this way, giving thanks for the gift of life that is given by both the apple tree and the Secians of long ago. Large piles of dirt and broken stone lay on either side of the street as workmen ready the east and west alleys for expansion.  A street lantern, an open Secian etched moonsilver door, a pair of open silver forged swinging doors, and a sign above the doors are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* east* south* west.

[Southern Avenue.]

Standing next to the large iron gate that separates the center of town from those of the elite class are several of the Spurian Guard. They are here to assist all who pass with the simple kindness of opening a gate, or the more important task of escorting those in need to the bank or market. A young looking cadet rubs wax into the stones of the city wall, his task is daunting, but one that will teach him discipline.  An open iron gate and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.

Obvious paths: north*.

You follow Ner'zul through an open iron gate...

[Gateway.]

An elegant, carved wooden sign hangs above the ornate gateway set into the massive wall that divides Spurs Noble District from the Town Square. You can make out city guardsmen peering down attentively at all that approach from their posts atop the imposing wall. They seem to take a greater interest in this part of town, though there does not seem to be anything threatening enough here to warrant such attention.  A street lantern, an open iron gate, and a gilded silver plaque are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south*.

You follow Ner'zul south...

[Noble Way.]

To the north, you can make out an ornately scrolled gateway set in the base of the imposing city wall. The refined roadway of Noble Way stretches out to the south. The cobblestones of the road are smooth and even. The attention to detail shown here is a dramatic change from some of the other parts of the city.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Noble Way.]

An unusually large home, even for this part of town, lies off to the west. It seems as if one ambitious owner is slowly buying up the lots next to his and adding them to his own. Groundskeepers are at work in the surrounding gardens, trimming and raking, so intent on their work they do not bother to acknowledge the passing traffic on the road.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* southwest*.

You follow Ner'zul southwest...

[Noble Way.]

Many grand, even ostentatious, homes line this stretch of Noble Way. Most of the residents here were fortunate enough to be born into the right families. Few that live in this area have ever actually had to work for a living. Glancing at the nameplates reveals many of the recognizable names of the Spur. Some of these names could almost be considered famous.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: northeast* south*.

You follow Ner'zul south...

[Noble Way.]

Noble Way continues to wind its way among the rather modestly sized, but elegant, homes of the Spur's successful. Many a peasant farmer may live in homes larger than these, but none can match the quality found here. A peaceful, luxurious feeling pervades this part of town; perhaps it is the drifting floral scents wafting from the well-tended gardens.  A closed elegant black iron gate and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

You follow Ner'zul south...

[Noble Way.]

Gazing down each of the nearby private drives reveals a glimpse of a luxurious home, each a miniature estate in its own right. Short, stout walls and manicured hedges serve to keep out the riffraff and to protect the small, expensive gardens. Every detail has been attended to display the exotic plants, in all their pampered perfection.  A street lantern and a closed rosewood door are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* southeast*.

You follow Ner'zul southeast...

[Noble Way.]

Leaving the exceptionally wealthy estates of the Spurian nobility, Noble Way heads toward the Town Square to the northwest. Along the roadside can be seen the in-city homes of successful merchants and other wealthy citizens of the Spur. The homes display a slightly different style, perhaps they are not quite so restrained; a touch more exuberance and freedom with materials is displayed.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

You follow Ner'zul southeast...

[Intersection.]

The avenue comes to a fork, with Noble Way curving from south to the northwest. A side-street heading off to the east leads to an extremely well kept neighborhood that easily surpasses everything around it in splendor and magnificence. Everything, even the carefully pruned trees and the manicured shrubbery displays a desire for elegant perfection.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south* northwest*.

[Noble Way.]

The entire avenue is composed of fine cobblestone, each level with its neighbor, providing a smooth ride for passing carriages and horses. The stones were customized by craftsmen, cut to order, rather than simply placed wherever they might fit. A few stately oaks and elms line the sides of the road, shading travelers during the daylight hours.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

He appears to be in perfect health.

Physical appearance:

A vast oog-ra stands before you, resplendent in thick body hair. He looks affable, but like much of his race, unwittingly menacing. He occasionally rubs the mark of Odarous necklace he wears at his collar, as if for comfort.

[Noble Way.]

Numerous trees lining the avenue serve as the dividing border between the majestic estates of the nobility and the lightly traveled roadway. The estates themselves are noticeably closer to the avenue than those to the south. However, they are no easier to access, still protected by their own guarding walls, some covered with ivy or colorful blooming vines.  A street lantern is here.

[Noble Way.]

Occasional gates and driveways lead back into the well-kept estates of the city's nobility, breaking and adding interest to the defining plane of the walls lining Noble Way. The rest of the street seems to mimic the splendor of the estates beyond the wall. Swept and trimmed, the roadway exudes a simple, yet beautiful elegance.  A street lantern is here.

[Noble Crossroads.]

A small roadway bordered by flowering hedges bisects the wide avenue of Noble Way at a right angle, heading east to west.  A thick, sturdy sign stands just off to the side of a charming path, its large friendly letters intent on luring travelers into the city's premiere roadstay, the Gilded Lion Inn. The entrance is clearly marked and welcoming, extending off to the southeast.  A wooden sign and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Noble Way.]

Majestic elms continue to line this broad roadway, sheltering the avenue on both sides and further enhancing the grandiose atmosphere. Fronting the beautiful homes, cobbled paths edged with narrow flower beds meander through nearby private gardens. Though they appear wonderful places to spend an afternoon or take a picnic, the glances from those tending the estates makes it clear they are only for the invited.  A street lantern is here.

[Noble Way.]

The occasional locked gate marks the entrance to some of the more hidden estates of Spurs nobility. From this broad avenue, little can be seen of their splendor. Behind the imposing gate recedes a proud drive, disappearing mysteriously into the trees. If not for the large imposing tower rising above the hedges it would be hard to discern anything was beyond the gate. It is apparent the residents do not wish to be disturbed.  A street lantern, a closed morbius door, and an open black iron gate are here.

[South Gate.]

A well-guarded gateway separates the city's residential district from the farmlands just beyond. Guards carefully eye all that enter or exit the city, beckoning gruffly to random travelers for a closer inspection. The structure of the guards' barracks is visible above the road to the west. A weathered wooden sign is posted by the gate.  An open iron gate, a wooden sign, a street lantern, an open thick stone door, and a fluffy white layer of snow are here.

>[South gate.]

Through the gate lies the city of Spur, the major center of trade and civilization on the plains. The dusty road leading through the gates is well traveled, and walls of the city are in good repair. A small shack sits to the west of the road, during most times of the day a dusty coach can be seen waiting in front, its horses stomping with impatience to be gone. To the right of the door is a small window, its opening covered with metal bars. An old man, missing most of his teeth, waits patiently for the travelers to pay their fare, and then directs them into the waiting area. On the east side of the road a billowing multicolored tent has been erected, the hustle and bustle of merchants and customers can be seen coming and going at all times of the day.  A rainbow silk tent, an open iron gate, and a fluffy white layer of snow are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south west*.

[Muddy Trap]

Large spikes line the bottom of this murky pit.  A dim light casts its muted glow from a single torch mounted high above.  In the filthy water covering the floor a rotting corpse bobs up and down leaving ripples along the waters surface.  Through the dim light, a makeshift ladder of cracked and splintered bones have been driven into the earth leading up the slippery walls.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra (lying down).
Obvious paths: None.

[Muddy Trap]

The splintered bone ladder rises up into the darkness, as the pit seems to expand on either side.  Halfway up the slippery walls, the muddy pit opens into a crudely burrowed hole.  Sloping upwards the hole is just about the right size for a large Oog-ra to transverse, if they crawl through on their knees.  Very little can be seen through hole, but given the options, up through the hole appears better than back down into the muddy pit.

Obvious paths: east* southwest west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west.
>
You follow Ner'zul through an open thick wooden door...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Heat radiates in this small room as a large blazing fireplace takes up the better part of the far wall. In the center of the room several anvils are set upon large stones. The implements and tools of a smith are kept in an organized manner against the remaining three walls. A rather large hob-goblin pounds away on a sword towards the back of the building, carefully holding it into the fire until it glows and then removing it and shaping it in a well learned manner. So intent upon his work, he doesn't notice anyone who wanders in.  An open thick wooden door and a scratched steel anvil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: None.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east* southeast west.

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east*.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment. You follow Ner'zul northeast...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south southwest* west.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* southeast south.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior and the 2nd hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west*.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor. [Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west.
>
You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace and a closed small hardened leather sheath are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace and a closed small hardened leather sheath are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west.
>
You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east* southeast west.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east southeast west.
>
You follow Ner'zul north...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south* southwest west.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south southwest west.
>
You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.  An open darkened bag is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior and the 2nd hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* southeast south.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a stone tribal pendant, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, and an open faded bearskin bag are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east*.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor.  With a sudden snore the warrior rears its head back quickly, smacking it sharply on a wooden post rendering himself unconscious.  An open wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west.
>
 ** You are fully rested.

 ** Current hit points: 242 out of 258
k ar

You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace and a closed small hardened leather sheath are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace and a closed small hardened leather sheath are here.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A heavily traveled path winds its way through old farmland. Clumps of wheat still rise from the ground, valiantly attempting to reestablish, but withered and dead weeds seem to choke the life out of them before they can grab hold. This area is illuminated.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A thick wooden wall surrounds an encampment and protects it from the surrounding wild lands.  A well-fortified gate is set within the wall.  On each side of the gate, a guard tower stands sentinel, clearly giving the guards within a view of the surrounding area.  The clang of weapon meeting weapon, echoes from somewhere within the camp.  A door, some bushes, and a closed tall wooden gate are here.

This area is illuminated.

She looks like an average hobgo-blin archer.

She looks like a wiry, tall go-blin with a sharp eye that stares directly at you.  With flawless movement it nocks its bow and takes aim.
She has a head, 2 arms, 2 legs.

She appears to be near death.
She is bleeding.
She will be not too hard for you to hit and it will be hard for her to hit you!

She is also carrying the following item:

  A closed painted silver coffer

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Heat radiates in this small room as a large blazing fireplace takes up the better part of the far wall. In the center of the room several anvils are set upon large stones. The implements and tools of a smith are kept in an organized manner against the remaining three walls. A rather large hob-goblin pounds away on a sword towards the back of the building, carefully holding it into the fire until it glows and then removing it and shaping it in a well learned manner. So intent upon his work, he doesn't notice anyone who wanders in.  An open thick wooden door and a scratched steel anvil are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: None.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Heat radiates in this small room as a large blazing fireplace takes up the better part of the far wall. In the center of the room several anvils are set upon large stones. The implements and tools of a smith are kept in an organized manner against the remaining three walls. A rather large hob-goblin pounds away on a sword towards the back of the building, carefully holding it into the fire until it glows and then removing it and shaping it in a well learned manner. So intent upon his work, he doesn't notice anyone who wanders in.  An open thick wooden door and a scratched steel anvil are here.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack. [Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door and an open patched sack are here.

l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a closed small hardened leather sheath, and a loose woven reed fishing basket are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior and the 2nd hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a closed small hardened leather sheath, and a loose woven reed fishing basket are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior and the 2nd hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west.
k wa
>

[3 sec. delay]

    The hobgo-blin warrior is knocked back!
    It stumbles and falls down!

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor.  With a sudden snore the warrior rears its head back quickly, smacking it sharply on a wooden post rendering himself unconscious.  An open wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.

>[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor. The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east southeast* west.

>It looks like an enchanted delicate crystal spyglass.
>[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.  A marble statue of a Human, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a rosewood sign, a crisp gold lettered vellum notice, a flowing white marble fountain, and a shimmering marble statue of a Dragon are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st speckled woodland owl (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Blade the Noble Thugian, Thistlethorn the Flerian (seated), Viktor the Leuian, Aldous the Usil Elf, Worlock the Arachnian, Augatil the Noble Leuian, and Kraggon the Noble Hithual.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

l at ner

Ner'zul looks like a 8'2" standard mature heavy boned, muscular bodied Oog-ra.
He is seated.
He has collar length, unbridled, wiry reddish black fur, with amber eyes, and looks disheveled.
He appears to be cold right now.
He can be attacked by other players.
He has no apparent injuries, but looks tired.

Physical appearance:

A vast oog-ra stands before you, resplendent in thick body hair. He looks affable, but like much of his race, unwittingly menacing. He occasionally rubs the mark of Odarous necklace he wears at his collar, as if for comfort.

                        Visible Equipment
A wickedly spiked steel war mace                   (right hand)
A heavy faceted iron plate mail                    (armor)
A floppy canvas hat                                (on head)
A glowing holy mark of Odarous                     (around neck)
Some spiky blackened iron gauntlets                (over hands)
A black leather greatcoat                          (over armor)
A strangely crested gold ring                      (ring (left))
A swirling rainbow crystal ring                    (ring (left))
A pair of black cotton pants                       (pants)
A huge mop of body hair                            (shirt)

He has been bestowed the following title(s):
  Noble of the Realm

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east*.

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment. The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southeast south*.

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south southwest west*.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* east southeast west.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east southeast west.
>

l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west*.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment. In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone. The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door and an open colorful calfhide sack are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A heavily traveled path winds its way through old farmland. Clumps of wheat still rise from the ground, valiantly attempting to reestablish, but withered and dead weeds seem to choke the life out of them before they can grab hold.  A small shack can be seen nearby.  Thick smoke billows from the chimney of the building accompanied by a loud ringing of tools against metal.

This area is illuminated.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A thick wooden wall surrounds an encampment and protects it from the surrounding wild lands.  A well-fortified gate is set within the wall.  On each side of the gate, a guard tower stands sentinel, clearly giving the guards within a view of the surrounding area.  The clang of weapon meeting weapon, echoes from somewhere within the camp. The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east* southeast west.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.

Obvious paths: north east southeast west.
>
You follow Ner'zul north...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south* southwest west.

l
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a gold coin, some silver coins, and a heavy black wool mourning dress are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south southwest west.
>
Ner'zul just picked up a gold coin.

Ner'zul just picked up some silver coins.

Ner'zul says in Oog-ra, "Gowd."
gri hugely
You grin hugely.
>
You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* southeast south.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* northeast east.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east southeast west*.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor.  With a sudden snore the warrior rears its head back quickly, smacking it sharply on a wooden post rendering himself unconscious.  An open wooden door is here.

In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south* west.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside. [Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A heavily traveled path winds its way through old farmland. [Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A thick wooden wall surrounds an encampment and protects it from the surrounding wild lands.  A well-fortified gate is set within the wall.  On each side of the gate, a guard tower stands sentinel, clearly giving the guards within a view of the surrounding area.  The clang of weapon meeting weapon, echoes from somewhere within the camp. [Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor.  With a sudden snore the warrior rears its head back quickly, smacking it sharply on a wooden post rendering himself unconscious.  An open wooden door, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a frayed sticky bit of string, some gauze bandages, and a closed blood-stained cloth sack are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast northwest.
>
Ner'zul just opened the closed blood-stained cloth sack.
' where get?

Hroomha asks in Oog-ra, " where get?"

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor.  With a sudden snore the warrior rears its head back quickly, smacking it sharply on a wooden post rendering himself unconscious.  An open wooden door, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a frayed sticky bit of string, some gauze bandages, and an open small iron animal snare are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast northwest.

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest* west.

' get gob with
A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door is here.

l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there. In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone. The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east* southeast west.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.

>[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace and a rough hewn maple shield are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east.

The hobgo-blin warrior stands up.
k wa

    It stumbles and falls down!

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace and a rough hewn maple shield are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior corpse.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east.
But the hobgo-blin warrior is dead!
>

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.  A steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a rough hewn maple shield, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a closed colorful sack, and a closed flowery doeskin bag are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warlord.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southeast south*.

l at wa
He looks like a small hobgo-blin warlord.

He looks like a veteran hobgo-blin adorned with a blackened skull pendant around its neck.  Its large frame is complimented by its agile movements and quick footwork.
He has a head, 2 arms, 2 legs.

He appears to be pretty mangled.
He is bleeding.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warlord corpse and the 1st hobgo-blin archer.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southeast south.

Ner'zul strips the hobgo-blin warlord's body.

The hobgo-blin warlord turns to dust.
I don't see what you are referring to.

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south southwest west*.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets. [Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west*.

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A heavily traveled path winds its way through old farmland. Clumps of wheat still rise from the ground, valiantly attempting to reestablish, but withered and dead weeds seem to choke the life out of them before they can grab hold.  A small shack can be seen nearby.  Thick smoke billows from the chimney of the building accompanied by a loud ringing of tools against metal.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: southeast west*.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A heavily traveled path winds its way through old farmland. Clumps of wheat still rise from the ground, valiantly attempting to reestablish, but withered and dead weeds seem to choke the life out of them before they can grab hold.  A small shack can be seen nearby.  Thick smoke billows from the chimney of the building accompanied by a loud ringing of tools against metal.

This area is illuminated.

You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, and a rusty iron sewer grate are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* southwest west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, and a rusty iron sewer grate are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west.
>
You follow Ner'zul through an open thick wooden door...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Heat radiates in this small room as a large blazing fireplace takes up the better part of the far wall. In the center of the room several anvils are set upon large stones. The implements and tools of a smith are kept in an organized manner against the remaining three walls. A rather large hob-goblin pounds away on a sword towards the back of the building, carefully holding it into the fire until it glows and then removing it and shaping it in a well learned manner. So intent upon his work, he doesn't notice anyone who wanders in.  An open thick wooden door and a scratched steel anvil are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warlord.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: None.

l at wa
She looks like a small hobgo-blin warlord.

She looks like a veteran hobgo-blin adorned with a blackened skull pendant around its neck.  Its large frame is complimented by its agile movements and quick footwork.
She has a head, 2 arms, 2 legs.

She appears to be pretty mangled.
She is bleeding.
She will be not too hard for you to hit and it will be not too hard for her to hit you!
                        Visible Equipment
A smooth pommeled carbide long sword               (right hand)

She is also carrying the following item:

  A closed gilded steelwood coffer

She is bleeding.
She will be not too hard for you to hit and it will be not too hard for her to hit you!

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, and a rusty iron sewer grate are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west.

>[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside. >
You follow Ner'zul west...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east* south west.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor.  With a sudden snore the warrior rears its head back quickly, smacking it sharply on a wooden post rendering himself unconscious.  An open wooden door is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north* northeast northwest.

A portly hobgo-blin warrior leans lightly upon the wall of a large bivouac.  His head bobs up and down sporadically as drool pours down his armor. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Standing single file is a small group of hobgo-blin troops.  Next!" barks an old instructor as a hobgo-blin warrior leaps forward to the first obstacle.  Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge.  The sharpened bamboo stakes jutting from the mouth emphasize the Hobgo-blin code, "Do or Die!"

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north east southeast* west.

Ducking swiftly through a line of swinging sand bags the hobgo-blin warrior expertly vaults a pit of spikes.  After landing the warrior presses on to the next challenge. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment.  Among a few small, red targets lies carcasses of hundreds dead and rotting animals riddled with the arrows.  Among the dead lies a recently slain bear that would rival any you have ever seen.  A single arrow is lodged deep into its skull directly between its eyes.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: north northeast east*.

[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Just past the spike pit to east, a small archery range has been built in this corner of the encampment. l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Down a short path from this overhang lies a deep pit half filled with slime covered stagnant water.  Slender poles have been driven into the bottom of the pit, planted just over an arm span apart, and of varying lengths, they offer perilous footing for crossing to the other side.  With a grunt a large hobgo-blin warrior loses his balance and splashes down in the foul waters of the pit.  The surface of the water near the fallen hobgo-blin warrior suddenly erupts and begins to boil, glittering flashes of silver break the water's surface frantically as hundreds of tiny piranha feast on the luckless soldier's thrashing body.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southeast south*.

2 hobgo-blin warriors just wandered in behind you at 3 UDs!

The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Training Course]

Perched on a small platform set high atop a wooden climbing wall is a hobgo-blin warrior seated between two large woven palm frond baskets.  Using his left hand the warrior reaches into one of the baskets and pulls out a thin strip of raw meat, with his right hand he retrieves a jagged rock from the other basket and flings it at a hobgo-blin warrior climbing up beneath him.  Barely dodging the hurtled rock, the climbing hobogoblin warrior clears the last section of wall to confront his comrade.  A brief struggle on the platform ends abruptly as one of the hobgo-blin warriors falls to the earth in defeat.  Drooling slightly, the victor quickly takes a seat on the platform, defending his position viciously with one arm, devouring his rations rapidly with the other.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warrior.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: south southwest west*.

With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west*.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

Gazing straightforward, stony eyed and silent a few hobgo-blin prisoners are restrained in wooden stocks that lie in the center of the encampment.  Two hobgo-blin warriors drag a prisoner up to a whipping post made from a massive steelwood trunk and chain him there.  With a deft flick of his wrist an ancient hobgo-blin warlord uncoils a iron-barbed bullwhip and steps up behind the prisoner.  The snap of the whip splits the air with a deafening CRACK! In a spray of green flesh, blood, and iron barbs, the prisoner's back is flayed to the bone.  A chopping block, an axe, and a row of hob-goblin heads on pikes let all who enter here know that punishment for all infractions of military code is meted out swiftly and without question.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east south west.
>
You follow Ner'zul east...


l
The area brightens.
[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A small wooden shack sits in the middle of an unkempt field. Broken stepping-stones lead up to the porch that surrounds the shack.  The clanging sound of metal on metal can be heard distinctly from within. The heat of the building radiates even as you stand outside.  Hanging from one chain above the door is a splintered wooden sign that reads, "Welco.."  An open thick wooden door, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, a steelwood handled iron flanged mace, and a rusty iron sewer grate are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin warlord.
In the area is Ner'zul the Noble Oog-ra.
Obvious paths: east southwest west*.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A heavily traveled path winds its way through old farmland. Clumps of wheat still rise from the ground, valiantly attempting to reestablish, but withered and dead weeds seem to choke the life out of them before they can grab hold.  A small shack can be seen nearby.  Thick smoke billows from the chimney of the building accompanied by a loud ringing of tools against metal.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st hobgo-blin archer.

[Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A thick wooden wall surrounds an encampment and protects it from the surrounding wild lands.  A well-fortified gate is set within the wall. [Hobgo-blin Encampment]

A muddy hole lies directly beneath a dense sticker strewn bush.  Pressed up against a tall wooden wall, the bush has obviously grown wild for many years and has been left to grow wild. [Road.]

This road leads out from the docks to the southeast and continues west through a gate which has just recently been erected.
